Uses of Class
tue.yellow.ListTracker

    • Uses of ListTracker in tue.yellow

      Methods in tue.yellow that return ListTracker 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ListTracker Patient.getListTracker()
      Gets the list (emergency room) to which the patient belongs
      ListTracker Nurse.getListTracker()
      Gets the list (emergency room) to which the nurse belongs
      ListTracker Doctor.getListTracker()
      Gets the list (emergency room) to which the doctor belongs
      Methods in tue.yellow with parameters of type ListTracker 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Patient.callNurse(ListTracker lt)
      When a patient calls for a nurse, he/she will be added in the list of patient that have called or requested a nurse.
      void Nurse.performClinicalExam(Patient assignedPatient, ListTracker lt)
      Performs a Clinical Examination on the patient, if the nurse is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another nurse, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Nurse.performDischarge(Patient assignedPatient, ListTracker lt)
      Performs a Discharge on the patient, if the nurse is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another nurse, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Nurse.performExternalMI(Patient assignedPatient, ListTracker lt)
      Performs an External Medical Imaging on the patient, if the nurse is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another nurse, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Nurse.performMedication(Patient assignedPatient, ListTracker lt)
      Performs a Medication on the patient, if the nurse is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another nurse, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Nurse.performOtherExamTreatment(Patient assignedPatient, ListTracker lt)
      Performs an Other Examination and Treatment on the patient, if the nurse is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another nurse, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Patient.setListTracker(ListTracker listTracker)
      Sets the list to which the patient belongs.
      void Nurse.setListTracker(ListTracker listTracker)
      Sets the list to which the nurse belongs.
      void Doctor.setListTracker(ListTracker listTracker)
      Sets the list to which the doctor belongs.
      Constructors in tue.yellow with parameters of type ListTracker 
      Constructor and Description
      Doctor(java.lang.String staffName, ListTracker listTracker)
      Creates a doctor object, using two input values:
      1) name of the doctor
      2) list type of the doctor (meaning the emergency room of the doctor)
      This method adds the doctor to the list of the emergency room upon creation.
      Nurse(java.lang.String staffName, ListTracker listTracker)
      Creates a nurse object, using two input values:
      1) name of the nurse
      2) list type of the nurse (meaning the emergency room of the nurse)
      This method adds the nurse to the list of the emergency room upon creation.
      Patient(int number, ListTracker lt)
      Creates a number of patient objects, all with a generic name (patient i).
      Patient(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String complaints, Patient.TriageUrgency triageUrgency, Bed.Zone triageZone, ListTracker lt)
      Creates a patient object using 5 input values:
      1) Name of the patient
      2) Complaints of the patient
      3) Triage urgency of the patient (IMMEDIATE, VERY_URGENT,URGENT,STANDARD,NON_URGENT)
      4) Triage zone of the patient (TRAUMA/NO_INJURY)
      5) List (emergency room) to which the patient belongs
      This constructor adds the patient to the list of the emergency room upon creation.
